name: Vanishing Woods
description:
Navigate your way through these treacherous woods! Beware of zombies. Read the notes after defeating all the enemies to get a clue of which path to take. Take the wrong path and you'll loop around.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space to jump

Left click to shoot

R to reload

Q to switch weapons

Shift to sprint

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47. Hope you enjoy!
